combine.context:
chat = """{{chat}}"""
human = """Human: {{human}}"""
bot = """Chatbot: {{bot}}"""
history = chat + "\n" + human + "\n" + bot + "\n"
print(history)

code.context:
{{text}}

Give better code according to the above conversation

text1.context: You are a code repair bot having a conversation with a human.If you receive some codes please check the code and point out the error. If there is no error, say “there is no error in this code.”

choice_1.context:
{{choice_1}}

Continue to make up the story according to the previous conversation.

choice.context:
